category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 3 (Purpose of Establishment and Utilization)
contents: Article 3 (Purpose of establishment and use) ① The athletes' village provides systematic and scientific training for national team athletes, national team candidate athletes, youth athletes, and aspiring athletes to achieve excellent results in international competitions such as the Olympics and Asian Games. For the purpose. ② The athletes' village not only supports the facilities necessary for national team training, but also provides facilities for various activities to promote public health and sports, as well as official sports-related events hosted by the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Council), sports association member organizations, and city/provincial branches. It can be used as a facility. Revised 2020. 10. 23.
